member.name: ID2D1BlendTransform.GetDescription
member.summary: Gets the blend description of the corresponding blend transform object.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the blend description specified for the blend transform.

member.name: ID2D1BlendTransform.SetDescription
member.summary: Changes the blend description of the corresponding blend transform object.
member.param: The new blend description specified for the blend transform.

summary.para: Provides methods to allow a blend operation to be inserted into a transform graph.
The image output of the blend transform is the same as rendering an image effect graph with these steps:

item.description: Copy the first input to the destination image.
Render the next input on top using the blend description.
